snippet: Dr. Warner was a trailblazer in a field that has come to be known as medical informatics, which involves the use of computers to help make medical decisions.
abstract: Homer R Warner, physiologist whose research helped introduce computer analysis to diagnosing illnesses, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Warner was a trailblazer in a field that has come to be known as medical informatics, which involves the use of computers to help make medical decisions.

headline.seo: Homer R. Warner, a Pioneer of Using Computers in Patient Care, Dies at 90
headline.main: Homer R. Warner, a Pioneer of Using Computers in Patient Care, Dies at 90
